TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed RequestNotificationStatus extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the state of a notification in the request pipeline.

remarks.format: ## Remarks RequestNotificationStatus is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
